name: Spear Guild
description:
Embark on a "Journey" through a Lost Castle, in this Infinite "Runner", gaining and losing Allies as you Defeat Enemies!

This game was made for the Brackeys Game Jam:

  • Theme: "Stronger Together"

Each Time you Defeat an Enemy, 2 new Allies will Join you, but each Time you Attack, 1 will Vanish. In order to get a High Score, you will need to get Stronger Together!
